oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter from Maria Dominguez Roldan about her new job
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter to Elise Croft from Maria Luisa Dominguez Roldan, in reply to Elise's letter. Maria is offended by Elise's refusal to introduce her to the U.S. Ambassador to Cuba and mentions her position at the newly-created Ministry of Social Work under Elena Mederos, a prominent women's rights activist and first Minister of Social Work in Cuba.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Dominguez Roldan, Maria Luisa
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Cuba--Politics and government; Mederos, Elena, 1900-1981
